content: a hooded scarf scoodie made to resemble an ewok size small child 3 skeins of super bulky weight yarn used lionbrand hometown usa in portsmouth pumpkin small amount of super bulky weight yarn usedlionbrand hometown usa in billings chocolate small amount of bulky weight yarn as accent used lionbrand homespun in bareley crochet hook - size k 6 5 mm suede cord optional two buttons optional nail brush or something similar to brush accent yarn pattern stitches chain = chain space s = space s st s = stitch es slip_stitch = slip_stitch skip = skip mc = magic_ring single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet half_double_crochet decrease = half_double_crochet decrease rs = right side ws = wrong side fo = finish off scoodie is worked mostly as one piece some construction is required to finish for more patterns from me check out my blog https //mycreativeblog com/ 1 1 https //mycreativeblog com/
